metadata.name: African Tribes Club #1
metadata.description: The African Tribes Club is a collection of 10,000 unique African tribes Mask NFTsâ€” unique digital collectibles living on the Ethereum blockchain. Your African Tribes Mask is your African Tribes Club membership card. Your membership card enable us to offer a brighter future for 10 000 orphans of society that commonly get left behind, you'll help widows and orphans rise out of poverty and live comfortably with the basic resources all human beings should have access to. Masks serve an important role in rituals or ceremonies with varied purposes like ensuring a good harvest, addressing tribal needs in times of peace or war, or conveying spiritual presences in initiation rituals or burial ceremonies. There were several ancient 'tribes' or civilizations of Africa. Africa is a very large continent, with a wide variety of geography such as the rainforest, savanna and desert. Each different region had a culture that was unique to match Visit www.miriblon.com for more details.
